title: 437 of 2020)), and after consulting with the Minister for Health, hereby order
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Assisted Decision-Making (Capacity)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Assisted Decision-Making (Capacity) 

Act 2015 (Section 7(1)) (Commencement) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited assisted decision-making (capacity) act 2015 (section 7(1)) (commencement) order 2021

title: 437 of 2020)), and after consulting with the Minister for Health, hereby order
heading: 2. The 1st day of February 2021 is appointed as the day on which section
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of February 2021 is appointed as the day on which section 
7(1) of the Assisted Decision-Making (Capacity) Act 2015 (No. 64 of 2015) 
shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 January, 2021. 

RODERIC O’GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [24] 3

title: 437 of 2020)), and after consulting with the Minister for Health, hereby order
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order appoints 1st February 2021 as the date on which Section 7(1) of the 
Assisted Decision Making (Capacity) Act 2015 comes into operation. 

Section 7(1) repeals the Marriage of Lunatics Act 1811.
